title: File copy failed: no directory configured, or it could not be accessed.
content:
Been trying to post to the font id section as i quite regularly do and all of a sudden im getting this message when trying to attatch a file.  
What does this mean?
author: planet_embroidery

comments.content: Me too... What is going on?
Not sure, but I managed to add a file to my post after it was posted by using "insert image" on it.
